data.name: The Peaks Resort and Spa
data.hotelDescription:
Luxurious Ski-In/Ski-Out Resort in Telluride, Colorado

Unparalleled Skiing Experience
Experience heli-skiing with our on-site helicopter and relax in our indoor/outdoor connecting pool after a day on the slopes.

Gourmet Dining and Relaxation
Indulge in locally sourced cuisine at Altezza Restaurant, unwind with live music at The Great Room & Deck, and savor espresso at Bean Cafe. For a refreshing break, visit the Deep End Pool Bar.

Wellness and Comfort
Enjoy stunning views from accommodations with picture windows, stay connected with free WiFi, and pamper yourself in glass-enclosed showers. Our full-service spa, fitness center, and concierge services ensure a rejuvenating stay.

Book now for an unforgettable mountain retreat at The Peaks Resort and Spa in Telluride!

data.name: Camel's Garden Hotel
data.hotelDescription:
Luxurious Spa Services
Indulge in massages, body treatments, and facials at our inviting spa. Relax and rejuvenate with our spa tub and sauna, offering the perfect retreat after a day on the slopes.

Convenient Amenities
Benefit from our ski-in/ski-out access, complimentary Wi-Fi, and on-site shopping. Unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge after a satisfying meal at Oak Restaurant, or start your day with a complimentary continental breakfast.

Ideal Location
Located steps away from Telluride Ski Resort and nearby attractions, Camel's Garden Hotel offers comfortable rooms with fireplaces and flat-screen TVs. Explore the historic district or hit the slopes with ease.

Book now for an unforgettable stay at Camel's Garden Hotel in Telluride!

data.name: The Hotel Telluride
data.hotelDescription:
Luxurious Accommodations
Nestled at the base of the San Juan Mountains, Hotel Telluride offers boutique rooms with cozy gas fireplaces, free WiFi, and modern amenities like microwave and refrigerator.

Relaxation and Recreation
Guests can unwind at the on-site spa, soak in the hot tub, or enjoy the sun terrace with stunning mountain views. The hotel also provides a gym for fitness enthusiasts and a free shuttle service to explore the town and reach the ski gondola conveniently.

Convenient Services
Experience top-notch service with concierge assistance and free bicycle rentals during the summer months. With a prime location just a short walk from Telluride’s Historic District, Hotel Telluride is the perfect retreat for your Colorado getaway.

Book now to indulge in a luxurious mountain escape at Hotel Telluride.

data.name: Inn at Lost Creek
data.hotelDescription:
Mountain Views from Rooftop Hot Tubs
Enjoy the stunning mountain views from our 2 rooftop hot tubs, the perfect way to unwind after a day of exploring Telluride.

Suite Amenities
All suites at Inn at Lost Creek come with a kitchenette, flat-screen cable TV, DVD player, washer and dryer, microwave, small refrigerator, and a balcony to soak in the scenic surroundings.

Convenient Facilities
Take advantage of our sauna, business center, banquet facilities, and 24-hour reception. Plus, indulge in 30 craft beers at the nearby Tomboy Tavern.

Book your stay at Inn at Lost Creek for a relaxing and memorable mountain getaway!

data.name: Mountainside Inn
The Victorian Inn
data.hotelDescription:
Luxurious Amenities
Featuring a hot tub and sauna, Victorian Inn Telluride offers a relaxing retreat for guests. The cozy rooms are equipped with all the comforts of home, including a seating area, refrigerator, and coffee-making facilities.

Convenient Location
Situated just a short walk from Telluride Gondola Station and nearby attractions like Historic Main Street and San Miguel River Trail, our hotel provides easy access to the best that Telluride has to offer.

Exceptional Services
From concierge assistance to laundry facilities, we strive to make your stay as seamless as possible. Free Wi-Fi access ensures you stay connected throughout your visit at The Victorian Inn.

Experience the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Victorian Inn Telluride - book your stay now!

data.name: Telluride Lodge by Telluride Alpine Lodging
Mountain Lodge Telluride
data.hotelDescription:
Luxurious Mountain Retreat

Spacious Apartments with Cozy Fireplaces
Indulge in the privacy and comfort of our studio and 2-bedroom apartments, each equipped with a 2-way gas fireplace and gourmet kitchen or kitchenette featuring top-of-the-line appliances.

Premier Ski-in/Ski-out Access and Upscale Amenities
Enjoy the convenience of ski-in/ski-out access, heated outdoor pool, hot tub, exercise room, and steam room. Our ski services and seasonal restaurant ensure a seamless and delightful stay.

Spectacular Location
Surrounded by the San Juan Mountains, our property is a stone's throw away from Telluride Ski Resort and easily accessible from Telluride and Montrose Regional Airports.

Book your luxurious mountain getaway at Mountain Lodge Telluride now!

data.name: New Sheridan Hotel
data.hotelDescription:
Historic Downtown Hotel in Telluride, Colorado

Luxurious Amenities: Enjoy rooms with modern conveniences like a flat-screen TV, iPod docking station, and laptop safe. Take advantage of the rooftop bar with stunning mountain views, spa services, and a helpful concierge.

Delicious Dining Options: Indulge in mouthwatering steak and seafood at the on-site New Sheridan Chop House. Sip on cocktails at the full-service bar for a complete dining experience.

Convenient Location: Just 2 blocks from Telluride Ski Resort, and close to attractions like the New Sheridan Opera House and Bridal Veil Falls. Free Wi-Fi and all-day coffee in the lobby make your stay even more enjoyable.

Book now to experience a blend of history and luxury at the New Sheridan Hotel in Telluride!

data.name: Hotel Columbia
data.hotelDescription:
Experience the ultimate mountain getaway at Hotel Columbia, where luxury meets adventure in the heart of Telluride.

Ski-In/Ski-Out Access Immerse yourself in the winter wonderland with convenient ski-in/ski-out access. Hit the slopes right from your doorstep and return to unwind after a thrilling day on the mountain.

Dining and Drinks Delight in culinary excellence at the Cosmopolitan Restaurant, where you can treat yourself to satisfying meals. Wind down with a refreshing drink at our inviting bar/lounge, perfect for relaxing after an action-packed day.

Comfortable Accommodations Our 21 air-conditioned rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi, ensuring you're entertained and connected throughout your stay. Enjoy the luxury of daily housekeeping, and indulge in our complimentary buffet breakfast to kickstart your day.

Don't miss your chance to experience the charm of Hotel Columbia—book now for an unforgettable stay!
